casebody.data:
G. V. COFFMAN et al. v. CITY OF WICHITA, Kansas, a municipal corporation. No. 5858. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Sept. 22, 1958. Speir, Stroberg & Sizemore, Newton, Kan., for appellants. Robert B. Morton, Fred W. Aley and Paul J. Donaldson, Wichita, Kan., for appellee.

Before MURRAH, PICKETT and BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed in accordance with the views expressed in the trial court’s opinion in D.C., 165 F.Supp. 765, without written opinion.
